body.p: Dr Friend you will please find inclosed petition to Governor Bramlette the facts are as Stated in petition almost all the Signers are Owners of Real Estate the Defts are poor men & Can Raise the Cost but iff the fine is not Remitted they will be bound to pay it in Jail unless the Neighbors Should Make it up & pay it for them the petition they Gave me was written with a pencil & I Copeyed it off with ink you will See the names are all in my hand writing you will very much oblige me as well as the whole Community around hear if you will attend to this at your Earliest Convenience
There is no news in this County we are all pleased with the Result of the Gov trip to Washington Unite on Receipt of this and oblige

Gallatin Cir Ct
vs
Ross & Fellabom
Black & Moore
Gaming
18th May/1864
$20- each

Remit except fees & costs
Tho E Bramlette
